Acceptance Criteria - Pipes transported to site and off loaded with no damage - ratchet tie downs (not chains), piloted transport. Report any damages.

Acceptance Criteria - Pipe laid down in a safe place - out of traffic lane, not causing water ponding issues, unable to roll away. Pipe laid down where damage can not be done - level & firm ground, transport dunnage used, sockets/spigots/ends are free from loads and clear of debris
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Safety Management
Acceptance Criteria - Lift plan, appropriately sized crane, tagged lifting equipment, ticket operators.
Verifying Document - Lift Plan, Site Briefing
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Lift Plan, Visual Inspection
Responsible - Project Manager & Crane Hire Company

Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Quality Control
Acceptance Criteria - Finished joint to be watertight. Sockets facing uphill. Clean barrells, spigots and sockets prior to jointing. Rubber rings in place and free of dust, grease or dirt.
